MIN_LENGTH: {property} should not be less than {constraints.0} characters
MAX_LENGTH: {property} should not be greater than {constraints.0} characters
MAX_LENGTH_NESTED: {property} should not contain elements that are greater than {constraints.0} characters
ARRAY_MIN_LENGTH: {property} should not be less than {constraints.0} elements
ARRAY_MAX_LENGTH: {property} should not be greater than {constraints.0} elements
INVALID_STRING_PATTERN: {property} must be a string matching the pattern {pattern}
INVALID_DATE: {property} must be a valid date string
